name: Feedback Factory: The Follow Up
description:
Place and connect buildings to accumulate resources to make more buildings which eventually make products, a.k.a, money!

A game made in a week for the LÖVE game jam 2023.

This is a new game based on the concepts of a game I made a while ago which was much worse. I had the idea to make a better version before I knew about the jam and then I found it and the theme fit perfectly!

It was my first time using the love framework but went pretty smoothly. Exporting to the web properly took a few tries, and there may be issues with the web page due to the experimental SharedArrayBuffer support.

Art made in Aseprite, music in LMMS, and the sound effects made by JBWasabi here: https://jdwasabi.itch.io/8-bit-16-bit-sound-effects-pack.
